name: Stars Below (HeroRobb)
description:
You have nothing but your body.

You have nothing but how the world perceives you.

You have nothing but your ability to perform labor.

You have nothing.

Or do you?

This is a sci-fi horror walking simulator. It has:

  • a low-poly retro aesthetic!
  • an emphasis on atmosphere!
  • approximately 30 minutes of playtime!
  • abstract storytelling!
  • controller support as well as mouse & keyboard!
  • something to say!
  • some bugs! (probably)
  • a lack of a save system!
  • a confusing timeline!
  • either disturbing or boring events depending on how jaded you are!
  • something to unlock after you've completed it!
